Posts.Title: Sudden inverted nipple

Posts.Content: Hello everyone this site is so reassuring , I noticed a dragging feeling in my right breast which made me examine and I have noticed the inverted nipple . I am 53 and through an early menapause 10 years ago . I'm very worried and have made an appt with my Gp , I'm not sure if the dragging feeling is psychological or not as it's not unbearable . I am so worried as my mum had breast cancer at my age and then cancer in her pancreas and sadly passed a short while after.  Woukd nd really appreciate your thought could it be my age ?  Thank you in advance  j
